channel.title: Remove Trading From Wilderness
channel.description:
I was just wondering of somebody could teach me how to remove trading from the wilderness. I'm having a pretty rough time trying to figure it out.
Please and thank you very much.

item.title: Remove Trading From Wilderness
item.dc:creator: @free_wayne free wayne
item.description:
@free_wayne wrote:

It kept giving me this crap about how it doesn’t recognize (absX, absY)

Read full topic

item.title: Remove Trading From Wilderness
item.dc:creator: @Mercifies Mercifies
item.description:
@Mercifies wrote:

usman555:

It has a “return” in it, so it means it wont show the request.

No no no… He’s saying blocking the trading, not just saying they can’t…

This would be the code you want to add:

if (tradeRequest == true) { PlayerHandler.players[tradeRequest] != null; } Or something around there you kinda have to play around with it. I just kinda made that code off the top of my head so I’m not sure if its gonna work or not I may have left out some stuff but play around with it. You’ll get it.

Read full topic

item.title: Remove Trading From Wilderness

item.description:

It has a “return” in it, so it means it wont show the request.

item.title: Remove Trading From Wilderness
item.dc:creator: @free_wayne free wayne
item.description:
@free_wayne wrote:

Ohh okay I understand.

But now I’m confused as to what is making it deny the request to trade.

Maybe I’m just missing it, but if had to guess from the code you just put there it looks to me like it’s telling them they can’t trade, but nothing is stopping the trade request from going through.

Read full topic

item.title: Remove Trading From Wilderness
item.dc:creator: @s_p_i_d_a_z s p i d a z
item.description:
@s_p_i_d_a_z wrote:

isInPvP
Is a method, its predefined somewhere else.

if(!isInPvP(absX, absY, 1)) { sM("You can't trade in the wilderness!"); return; }
So when its called upon in this Trade Condition. It wont allow them to trade in the wildy.

Here is the method for inpvp

public boolean isInPvP(int coordX, int coordY, int Type) { if ((absX <= 2940) || (absX >= 3400) ||(absY <= 3522) || (absY >= 3970)){ return true; } return false; }

Read full topic
